name: Ray Tracer
description:
Little Project where I tried to find out, wether I could programm my own Raytracer in Unity. Kill the enemies (red Boxes) and collect Ammunition (yellow Boxes). If the enemys touch you, it's game over. I made 3 levels, hope you enjoy!

Controls:

W/S            forward/backwards

A/D            turn left/right

E                  shoot

Space        jump (is useless and kinda broken)
